statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_warranty WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota' AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle_warranty WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota' AND vehicle_model = 'Corolla' AND warranty_provider = 'ABC Warranty Company'
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE year <= 2010 AND vin IS NULL;
DELETE FROM warranty_expiration WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM warranty_coverage WHERE coverage_id = 100 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM VehiclesWarranty WHERE vehicle_id = 100 AND provider_id = 1;
